g1.Name: Mr Boggis
g1.ActionDescription: Take $2, if possible, from each player

g2.Name: Mr Bent
g2.ActionDescription: Place this card in front of you and take a loan of $10 from the bank. At the end of the game you must pay back $12 or lose 15 points.

g3.Name: The Beggars Guild
g3.ActionDescription: Select one player. They must be give you two cards of their choice

g4.Name: The Bank of Ankh-Morpork
g4.ActionDescription: Place this card in front of you and take a loan of $10 from the bank. At the end of the game you must pay back $12 or lose 15 points.

g5.Name: The Ankh-Morpork Sunshine Dragon Sanctuary
g5.ActionDescription: Each Player must give you either $1 or one of their cards

g6.Name: Sergeant Angua
g6.ActionID: Remove One Trouble Marker,Play Another Card

g8.Name: The Dysk
g8.ActionDescription: Earn $1 for each minion in the Isle of Gods

g9.Name: The Duckman
g9.ActionDescription: Move a minion belonging to another player from one area to an adjacent area

g10.Name: Drumknott
g10.ActionDescription: Play any two other cards from your hand

g11.Name: CMOT Dibbler
g11.ActionDescription: Roll the die. On a roll of '7' or more you take $4 from the bank. On a roll of '1' you must pay $2 to the bank or remove one of your minions from the board. All other results have no effect

g14.Name: Mrs Cake
g14.ActionDescription: Look at all one of the unused Personality cards

g17.Name: Gaspode
g17.ActionDescription: Stop a player from moving or removing one of your minions

g18.Name: Fresh Start Club
g18.ActionDescription: If you have a minion removed you can place him in a different area

g19.Name: Foul Ole Ron
g19.ActionDescription: Move a minion belonging to another player from one area to an adjacent area

g20.Name: The Fools Guild
g20.ActionDescription: Select another player. If they do not give you $5 then place this card in front of them. This card now counts towards their hand size of five cards when they come to refill their hands. They cannot get rid of this card

g21.Name: The Fire Brigade
g21.ActionDescription: Choose a player. If he does not pay you $5 you can remove one of this buildings from the board

g23.Name: History Monks
g23.ActionDescription: Shuffle the discard pile and draw four cards randomly. Place the remaining cards back as the discard pile

g24.Name: Hex
g24.ActionDescription: Take three cards from the deck

g25.Name: Here'n'Now
g25.ActionDescription: Roll the die. On a roll of '7' or more you take $4 from the bank. On a roll of '1' you must pay $2 to the bank or remove one of your minions from the board. All other results have no effect

g26.Name: Harry King
g26.ActionDescription: Discard as many cards as you wish and take $2 for each one discarded

g30.Name: The Opera House
g30.ActionDescription: Earn $1 for each minion in the Isle of Gods

g31.Name: Nobby Nobbs
g31.ActionDescription: Take $3 from a player of your choice

g34.Name: Librarian
g34.ActionDescription: Take four cards from the draw deck

g35.Name: Leonard of Quirm
g35.ActionDescription: Take four cards from the draw deck

g36.Name: Shonky Shop
g36.ActionDescription: Discard as many cards as you wish and take $1 for each one discarded

g37.Name: Sacharissa Cripslock
g37.ActionDescription: Earn $1 for each trouble maker on the board

g38.Name: Rosie Palm
g38.ActionDescription: Choose one player. Given them one of your cards. They must give you $2 in return

g39.Name: Rincewind
g39.ActionDescription: Move one of your minions from an area containing a trouble maker to an adjacent area

g41.Name: Queen Molly
g41.ActionDescription: Select one player. They must give you two cards of their choice

g43.Name: Zorgo the Retro-phrenologist
g43.ActionDescription: You may exchange your personality card with one drawn randomly from those not in use

g44.Name: Dr Whiteface
g44.ActionDescription: Select another player. If they do not give you $5 then place this card in front of them. This card now counts towards their hand size of five cards when they come to refill their hands. They cannot get rid of this card

g45.Name: Wallace Sonky
g45.ActionDescription: You cannot be affected by the text on a card played by another player.

g46.Name: The Seamstresses' Guild
g46.ActionDescription: Choose one player. Give them one of your cards. They must give you $2 in return.

g48.Name: The Thieves' Guild
g48.ActionDescription: Take $2, if possible, from each player
